section.title: Weblogic
section.para: This agent returns performance metrics for a Weblogic Application Server.

sect2.title: Local/Remote Modes
sect2.para: The agent supports both local and remote modes.

sect2.title: Supported Versions
sect2.para: The agent supports Weblogic Application Server versions 8.x and 9.x

sect2.title: Configuration
sect2.para: The following configuration options are available for Weblogic version 8.x:

itemizedlist.listitem: Username: user name to use when connecting to Weblogic Application Server
Password: password to use when connecting to Weblogic Application Server
Weblogic home folder: the folder where Weblogic is installed (eg. C:\bea\weblogic8)
Classpath: path to jar files required by this agent; all are relative to the Weblogic home folder above
Connection string: the connection string required to establish the JMX connection
Show only runtime data: if true only runtime mbeans are displayed

sect2.para: The following configuration options are available for Weblogic version 9.x:

itemizedlist.listitem: Username: user name to use when connecting to Weblogic Application Server
Password: password to use when connecting to Weblogic Application Server
Weblogic home folder: the folder where Weblogic is installed (eg. C:\bea\weblogic9)
Classpath: path to jar files required by this agent; all are relative to the Weblogic home folder above
Connection string: the connection string required to establish the JMX connection

sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: All data available from Weblogic Application Server via the JMX connection.
